question_types.choice_desc: Choose one or many answers (eg. text, image, audio, video) dans une liste de choix prédéfinis.
question_types.cloze_desc: Fill gaps with relevant items in the constext. It's possible to fill it either by writing in a text box or  by choosing the item in a predefined list.
question_types.graphic_desc: Point one or many areas on an image.
question_types.match_desc: Link an item (eg. text, image, audio, video) with one or many others (eg. text, image, audio, video).
question_types.open_desc: Répondre à une question par un texte libre pouvant contenir des ressources (eg. text, image, audio, video). The open question requires a manual correction.
question_types.pair_desc: Put items (eg. text, image, audio, video) in pairs.
question_types.words_desc: Write an answer with one or many expected keywords.
question_types.set_desc: Move items (eg. text, image, audio, video) inside sets.
